description: It computes the tag-error-rate of an hypothesis file with respect to a reference file.
full_description: The tag-error-rate is calculated exploiting the TER alignments from which only the information related to the tags is taken into account. The tag-error-rate is an error measure: 0 means no errors, 1.0 means 100% of errors. Author is Mauro Cettolo from FBK
